title: HOW to KEEP your CHICKENS WATER from FREEZING OFF-GRID HACK

subtasks: Reviewing a blog post for a water de-icing method
Measuring a quarter cup of rock salt
Filling a 20-ounce bottle with lukewarm water and salt
Monitoring chicken water availability at sub-freezing temperatures
Checking for ice buildup in the water container
Documenting the success of the de-icing method
Engaging with viewers through comments and social sharing
